p: The surveillance physicians sought consent from the patients, or their guardians in the case of severely ill patients, to enrol them in the study. Written informed consent was obtained from patients aged over 17 years. For patients aged between 14 and 17 years, written assent was taken from the patients as well as obtaining written consent from their parents or guardians. The study protocol was reviewed and approved by the institutional review board of the icddr,b (Protocol # PR-14060). US CDC involvement in the study did not constitute engagement in human subjects research and therefore, CDC relied on appropriate IRB or ethics committee approval of engaged institutions.
